case.title: bored girl looking for some attention and fun - 26 (London)
case.text: I'm a young (under 30) woman, blonde, curvy, busy in social and work life but looking for someone to entertain me and possibly bring a bit more fun to London.Nothing serious, just someone to help the day go a little quicker and meet every now and then. Looking for a guy 30+, mature, confident, funny, preferably white and english. If you think you can help, mail me and let's see...
